Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Requires exit surveys for employees resigning from state civil service
Summary: Requires each agency to conduct exit surveys for employees resigning from state civil service; directs the state civil service commission to create an annual report on such surveys; exempts individual responses to exit surveys from the freedom of information law.
LawCode: Add ยง159-e, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring exit surveys for resigning employees
